data.title: Interior Design News
data.text:
Cooper Hewitt Announces 2017 National Design Award Winners

Cooper Hewitt has announced the winners of the 18th National Design Awards. The accolade recognizes design excellence & innovation in 11 categories, and aims to promote design as a vital humanistic tool in shaping the world.

May 8, 2017

NeoCon 2017

This June 12-14, the MART in Chicago will be the nexus for 50,000 international architects, designers, and C-suite executives who attend NeoCon for the definitive first look at new products and prototypes transforming commercial design.

May 2, 2017

INSIDE Awards 2017

Submissions are now open for the 2017 INSIDE Awards. Comprising the most original and exciting interiors from the last 12 months, projects can be entered across nine diverse categories: Bars and Restaurants, Display, Hotels, Residential, Retail, Creative Re-use, Offices, Culture, and Education.

May 1, 2017

JIDK Renovates Intent Media's NYC Office

When Intent Media, a five-year winner of Crain's New York Business' Best Place to Work, needed to renovate their 25,000 square foot office to reflect their values, they called on JIDK to transform the traditional, segmented office space into an open, non-hierarchical space complete with the unique touches in line with contemporary office ideals.

Apr 28, 2017

Rocky Pond Winery Tasting Rooms

SkB Architects recently completed Rocky Pond Winery Tasting Rooms. Located in downtown Chelan, Rocky Pond Winery is designed to bring a heightened sense of awareness to the winery's story and their wines.

Apr 28, 2017

City Villa by ARRCC

ARRCC has recently completed City Villa. Designed as an iconic family home, with modern natural design direction, the villa is an interplay of rectangular forms, perpendicularly opposed with cantilevered concrete elements to create a powerful and sculptural composition.

Apr 28, 2017

The Emancipation of Everything: IIDA NY Lecture to Analyze Impact of Societal Trends on Design

On Monday, May 8th, the New York Chapter of the International Interior Design Association (IIDA NY) will host Pioneering Design: The Emancipation of Everything, a lecture that will analyze the consumer attitudes, lifestyles, and economic trends of 2017 impacting design.

Apr 27, 2017

Good Design Award 2017

The 2017 Good Design Award is now open for submissions. Good Design Award is one of the world's leading design promotion system that aims to discover good design in various fields that develop industries and enrich our lives and to publicize them to society.

Apr 17, 2017

lauckgroup Designs Ideal Office for o9 Solutions

lauckgroup has recently completed a cutting-edge workplace for tech start-up o9 Solutions. Rooted conceptually in o9's tag line "Smart, Simple, Fun," the buildout integrates minimalism and efficiency while encouraging productivity by catering to a variety of different work styles.

Apr 17, 2017

iF Design Award 2018

The 2018 iF Design Award is now open for submissions. Agencies, architects, designers and companies from all over the world are invited to put their products and services to the test.

Apr 14, 2017

Morpholio Launches Ava: Design Your Entire Home on Your iPad

Morpholio has added a brand new feature to its Board Pro App. Short for Automated Visual Assembly, Ava was invented to package images and information more intelligently - optimizing beauty, clarity, and ease - and allowing designers to navigate seamlessly from process to presentation.

Apr 12, 2017

Park Hyatt Washington Unveils Renovated Guestrooms and Lobby Designed by Tony Chi

Tony Chi returned to Park Hyatt Washington, D.C. to make design enhancements to the hotel's guestrooms and lobby. Chi last completed a full redesign of the entire luxury hotel in 2006.

Apr 12, 2017

La Cardinale by L. McComber Architects

For a long time, this semi-detached house built in the 1950s in Montréal's Ville-Saint-Laurent neighbourhood was home to a family of three young children.

Apr 6, 2017

IIDA NY Explores Virtual Reality at Pioneering Design Event

On Monday, April 3rd, the New York Chapter of the International Interior Design Association (IIDA NY) hosted its 19th annual "Pioneering Design" lecture series, led by Caitlin Burns, a transmedia producer and the Vice Chair of the Producers' Guild of America.

Apr 5, 2017

First Look at Residences Inside Zaha Hadid's 520 West 28th Street

Related Companies has unveiled the first look inside the residences of Zaha Hadid's 520 West 28th, which was designed inside and out by the revered architect, as well as the unveiling of the building's first finished residences.

Apr 5, 2017

CIN Releases 2017 Color Trends Catalogue

CIN has released its 2017 Color Trends Catalogue, 'Color Revelation.' The catalogue brings together a total of 40 colors chosen to reveal the beauty of the house and its walls.

Apr 4, 2017

Meakins Road Residence by B.E Architecture

B.E Architecture recently completed the Meakins Road Residence, Flinders. Set on 100 acres in coastal Victoria, this site was bare of vegetation except for a 100-year-old row of Cypress trees.

Apr 2, 2017

NYC's Upper East Side Gets First Co-Working Space

New York City's Upper East Side recently welcomed its first co-working space to the area. The Commons, conveniently situated on East 86th Street - just steps away from the 4-5-6 and 2nd Avenue Subway lines - sports a contemporary interior, designed by local firm JIDK.

Mar 30, 2017

IIDA NY Lecture Series to Explore Virtual and Augmented Realities

On Monday, April 3rd, attendees at the New York Chapter of the International Interior Design Association's (IIDA NY) 19th annual "Pioneering Design" lecture series will get to engage in one of today's hot topics: virtual reality.

Mar 25, 2017

Surface Travel Awards 2017

The inaugural Surface Travel Awards are now open for submissions. The competition aims to recognize and honor the world's best, most thoughtfully conceived projects and products, as well as the architects, designers, and other innovators who inspire, empower, and connect travelers.

Mar 25, 2017

Rocky Pond Winery Tasting Room

SkB Architects recently completed the Rocky Pond Winery Tasting Room in Chelan, Washington. The space is designed to bring a heightened sense of awareness to the winery's story and their wines.

Mar 23, 2017

Designing the Glass Ceiling

Race, culture, and gender are influencing the makers of the design community and the International Interior Design Association's (IIDA) New York Chapter, wants to shatter the status quo at the upcoming Residential Forum: Designing The Glass Ceiling panel discussion.

Mar 23, 2017

2017 SBID International Design Awards

The 2017 SBID International Design Awards is now open for submissions. The competition recognizes, rewards and celebrates global interior design excellence, from the ultra-luxurious to new and innovative, and brings even bolder and more outstanding projects to the forefront of design.

Mar 18, 2017

Trend Micro Taps lauckgroup to Design Interiors for San Jose Location

When Trend Micro, a global leader in cybersecurity solutions, sought to transform its San Jose workspace, it turned to Dallas-based interior architecture firm lauckgroup, alongside AOR OMNIPLAN, to provide a design and strategy that would optimize staff performance and markedly increase innovation.

Feb 27, 2017

Universal Design 2017 Conference NYC

Universal Design Conference, an inaugural event bringing together leading professionals from the fields of architecture and design, technology, healthcare, education and government, is being hosted to promote accessibility and ensure inclusion and equality for people of diverse abilities and backgrounds, no matter their size or age.

Feb 24, 2017

Belmond Mount Nelson Reveals its Guestroom Redesign

Inge Moore and her London-based design team have completed the refurbishment of 48 guestrooms and suites in one of the world's most iconic hotels - Cape Town's Belmond Mount Nelson.

Feb 20, 2017

UXUS Designs Kebaya: A New Pan-Asian Brasserie at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol

UXUS has designed Kebaya, a new Pan-Asian brasserie, positioned as the highlight of the new Departure Lounge 2 at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol.

Feb 10, 2017

MCM Architecture Completes Fit-out of Bird & Bird's New London HQ

MCM began working with Bird & Bird in 2012 when they began developing a forward-looking property strategy for their London accommodation based on the expiry of several lease obligations in 2016.

Feb 5, 2017

De Bijenkorf Restaurant by i29 Interior Architects

i29 has recently completed 'The Kitchen,' a new restaurant located in De Bijenkorf Utrecht, a high quality department store. The brief was to create a unique dining experience which seduces and inspires.

Feb 4, 2017

Coroflot Unveils Innovative Mobile Workplace

Coroflot has recently unveiled its Mobile Work Unit (MWU). The concept for the trailer-office grew from a desire to create a space solution that referenced both the mobility and creative talent of the Coroflot community, as well as the future of the site.

Feb 4, 2017

align Designs Exciting New Bar and Concert Venue Omeara

London has a new late night bar, live gigs and events venue called Omeara, designed by align and bringing 'The Low Line' of railway arches between Waterloo and London Bridge back to life.

Feb 2, 2017

Steadfast Chicago by Parts and Labor Design

Steadfast is a new brasserie-style restaurant in the heart of Chicago's Financial District that brings an innovative and chef-driven concept to the ground floor of The Kimpton Gray Hotel.

Feb 2, 2017

ASID Foundation Opens 2017 Transform Grants

The ASID Foundation is now accepting proposals for its sixth annual Transform Grants. This year, the foundation will award up to $100,000 to evidence-based research projects that address interior design or policy solutions that use space to enhance one or more elements of well-being for all. The ASID Foundation considers the five elements of well-being to be physical, social (mental/emotional), financial, career, and community.

Jan 29, 2017

2017 AAP Firm of the Year Award

Submissions are now open for the inaugural AAP Firm of the Year. The new program aims to honor the lifetime achievements of architecture, interior and landscape design companies.

Jan 26, 2017

Be Original Americas Announces Second Annual Summer Design Fellowship

Be Original Americas is calling for applications for its second annual Summer Design Fellowship, an unparalleled opportunity for two college students to gain real world, hands-on experience about all it takes to make, distribute, and sell great design from industry leading companies across the country.

Jan 26, 2017

MBH Architects Turns Former Laboratory into New Office Space

MBH Architects has relocated to a new office just a mile away from its previous space. Located in the Marina Village Parkway area with panoramic views of the San Francisco Bay, the firm created a one-of-a-kind workplace, which is housed in a former biological manufacturing laboratory.

Jan 15, 2017

2017 Radical Innovation Award: Call for Entries

The 2017 Radical Innovation Award will open for entries on January 17. With an expanded interest in moving ideas from concepts to reality, Radical Innovation is asking participants to submit hospitality concepts that provide not only new meaningful travel experiences for consumers, but also new revenue growth opportunities for owners, investors, operators, contractors and vendors.

Jan 12, 2017

2017 Restaurant & Bar Design Awards

Call for Entries are now open for the 2017 Restaurant & Bar Design Awards. The Awards is open to UK and International projects launched or renovated in 2016.

Jan 9, 2017

Hospitality Design Exposition & Conference 2017

The 2017 Hospitality Design Exposition & Conference will be held May 3-5 at Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas. The 26th year of the premier show will host interior designers, architects, purchasing agents, owners, operators, brand executives, and other hospitality design professionals.

Jan 4, 2017

The Principal York by Goddard Littlefair

The Principal York, designed by Goddard Littlefair, has won the Gold Award for Hospitality Interior Design at the London Design Awards 2016, to be presented at a ceremony in March of this year.

Jan 4, 2017

SI Restaurant by 5 Star Plus Retail Design

5 Star Plus designed the interiors for the new Simply Italian Restaurant in Hong Kong. The restaurant offers antipasti, pasta, main courses and desserts prepared by their executive Chef Massimo Santovito in an open kitchen, and houses its own bar.

Jan 3, 2017

Paf Unveils New Headquarters

Paf recently unveiled its new headquarters in Åland. The facade and roof of the building is covered with solar panels to ensure that the head office is completely self-sufficient in terms of energy.

Jan 3, 2017

Interior Design Show Releases 2017 Design Trends Forecast

The Interior Design Show curators have released their forecast for some of the top trends for 2017 inspiring the direction of design for the year to come.

Jan 3, 2017

JOI-Design Creates a Spirited Sanctuary at a 13th Century Pilgrimage Site

JOI-Design has recently completed the refurbishment of a 13-bedroom annex to the Altenberger Hof, a bijou boutique hotel looking onto the 13th century Altenberg Cathedral and the verdant meadows and forests of Bergisches Land in central Germany.

Jan 3, 2017

Lauckgroup Creates Family-friendly Workplace to Empower Women in Need

lauckgroup designed a custom space for WiNGS, Women in Need of Generous Support, a Dallas-based nonprofit dedicated to providing Dallas women and their families with a path to better life through financial management classes, micro-enterprise coaching, and women's health assistance.

Dec 19, 2016

2017 Interior Design Show Toronto

From January 19-22, the 2017 Interior Design Show will return to Toronto for its 19th year, showcasing hot-topic design trends and the most innovative of international and Canadian design.

Dec 18, 2016

What Clients Want: Volume 3 Explores Retail Design and the Consumer Experience

What Clients Want: Essential Conversations about Retail Design, the third in the acclaimed series focused on the unique relationship between clients and designers, is now available.

Dec 17, 2016

Guestroom Designs for Global Tribes: Sleep Set Competition Reveals New Ways of Looking at Hotel Design

Five uniquely imagined guestroom concepts were constructed for the hotel community at Sleep in November when designers from Europe and Asia unveiled their Sleep Sets in response to this year's 'Science of Tribes' competition.

Dec 17, 2016

Miami's First Annual Hospitality Design Awards: Call For Entries

Submissions are now open for the inaugural Miami Hospitality Design Awards. The awards will showcase the design and architecture of Miami's hospitality sector, which have elevated the city's industry.

Dec 16, 2016

New Monotype Office by Ben Adams Architects

Ben Adams Architects, with the collaboration of SEA Design, designed the new HQ for Monotype, located in London's centre of tech and creativity: Shoreditch.

Dec 15, 2016

Ubisoft Quebec City

Coarchitecture designed Ubisoft's new workspace in Quebec City. The lighting of these new spaces, designed to encourage creative projects, was at the heart of the conception and LumiGroup's expertise was called upon to achieve all the of the project's objectives.

Dec 14, 2016

Red's True BBQ in Newcastle by DesignLSM

DesignLSM has recently completed the eighth site of the leading smokehouse brand Red's True BBQ in Newcastle's intu Eldon Square.

Dec 13, 2016

Huniford Design Studio Wins Prestigious Global Award for Eco-Friendly Penthouse

Huniford Design Studio was honored by the Americas Property Awards in the Interior Design Private Residence - New York category for its' 7 Bond Street residential project.

Dec 13, 2016

IIDA 2017 Interior Design Competition and Will Ching Design Competition Now Open

Submissions are now open for the International Interior Design Association's (IIDA) 44th annual Interior Design Competition and the 25th annual Will Ching Design Competition.

Dec 13, 2016

PANTONE Color of the Year 2017: Greenery

PANTONE has revealed the 2017 Color of the Year, Greenery, a fresh and zesty yellow-green shade symbolizes new beginnings, evoking the first days of spring when natures greens revive, restore, and renew.

Dec 8, 2016

A Sneak Peak of Modern by Dwell Magazine

Target has collaborated with Dwell Magazine to launch a home look book, Modern by Dwell Magazine, to be released on December 27. The book features more than 120 items, including furniture, decor, tabletop and accessories.

Dec 6, 2016

Main Street at eBay Headquarters by ESI Design

eBay's corporate campus in San Jose has unveiled a new "front door" to the company with Main Street, a 20,000-square-foot hub designed by ESI Design that brings the brand to life through massive interactive installations and displays in a bright, airy setting.

Dec 5, 2016

4th International Green Interior Awards

Entries are now open for the 4th International Green Interior Awards. The competition aims to showcase world leading, innovative and inspirational interior spaces that are packed with interior products that have a positive affect for people and environment.

Dec 5, 2016

Fence House by mode:lina

Mode:lina Architekci recently completed 'Fence House,' located in Borówiec, Poland. The singular house consists of two blocks with a pitched roof and an asymmetric cube for the garage.

Dec 4, 2016

Paramount by The Office Space Wins Best Office at 2016 WAF INSIDE

Paramount by The Office Space, designed by Woods Bagot, has been awarded the best designed workplace at the prestigious World Festival of Interiors (INSIDE), winning the competitive Office category in Berlin.

Dec 4, 2016

La Casa by MXMA

MXMA designed the interior for a duplex, located in the heart of Montreal's Plateau-Mont-Royal borough, to create an innovative living space with abundant wood surfaces.

Dec 4, 2016

Boos Beach Club Restaurant by Metaform

Metaform recently completed the Boos Beach Club Restaurant located in Bridel, Luxembourg. The new structure, interwoven around the existing house, is inspired by the Japanese art of origami.

Dec 4, 2016
